## sandjs package

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[layout(config)](./sandjs.layout.md)


</td><td>

Computes the polar coordinates for every visible arc in the provided configuration.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[renderSVG(options)](./sandjs.rendersvg.md)


</td><td>

</td></tr>
